creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil, slit neck opening randa; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; upper half of garment is heavily brocaded with orange, yellow, blue and purple geometric designs of chevrons, triangle, parallelograms, etc.; lower half has large sections of white on white patterning alternating with multicolored rows.
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
